  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.bind.binders.DefaultBodyAnnotationBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>

    AnnotatedArgumentBinder<Body,io.reactivex.Maybe,HttpRequest<?>>, ArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe,HttpRequest<?>>, TypeArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe,HttpRequest<?>>, AnnotatedRequestArgumentBinder<Body,io.reactivex.Maybe>, BodyArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>, NonBlockingBodyArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>, RequestArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>, TypedRequestArgumentBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>

public class MaybeBodyBinder
extends DefaultBodyAnnotationBinder<io.reactivex.Maybe>
